title: A New Kind of Ranching Is Taking Its Place at the Ponderosa!

tasks.task: Check and move the big Joe herd to pasture.
subtasks: Bring hay for the big Joe herd.
Roll out hay for the big Joe herd.
Observe the turkeys' feeding preferences and note their protein intake.

tasks.task: Implement a plan to increase the wild turkey population.
subtasks: Help assemble the mobile pen with team members.
Transport hens and toms into the mobile pen.
Acclimate wild turkeys to the new pen.

tasks.task: Prepare a new pond for bison grazing.
subtasks: Remove debris from the previously dry pond.
Clean the pond to ensure cattle safety.
Ensure the pond has a water source for bison.

tasks.task: Update viewers on a partnership with Happy Farmer.
subtasks: Promote Happy Farmer's mobile chicken/turkey units.
